content:
We need all the help we can get to spread the word about Backdrop LIVE in the next 5-6 days. This is a huge opportunity for us to grow our community.

  • Please help share or retweet our messages in social media
  • Post your own messages on social media
  • Share with work colleagues
  • Invite your Drupal friends via Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/events/354978835871692/)
  • Invite clients
  • Write a blog post
  • Put a sign in your front yard ;-)
@StPaulTim you are amazing :) thank you for all the backdrop livestuff!!!!
